name: skill-descriptions
description: Tests for skill description quality and completeness

tests.name: skill descriptions are multi-sentence
tests.description: Descriptions should be at least 100 characters (3-4 sentences)

tests.name: skill descriptions include 'Use when' guidance
tests.description: Descriptions should explain when to use the skill

tests.name: skill descriptions include 'Do NOT use' guidance
tests.description: Descriptions should explain when NOT to use the skill

tests.name: skills have YAML frontmatter
tests.description: Skills must have YAML frontmatter with name field

notes.pattern: Good skill descriptions follow: What it does + When to use + When NOT to use
